Articles.Content:
Synopsis: Duna Rescue mission, not direct hohmann transfer.

Selected flight through Radar Center.

Black screen, altimeter turns into a slot machine and rolls 666666, velocity /nan and Navbal black.

I actually copied the save right before this. Any precautions?

I just went back and the ship disappeared. Going to reload that previous save. Edit: Fixed with reload. Copied save immediately before. Good thing I did!

Edited December 8, 2013 by Tank Buddy
The null space bug, it's already been reported before. Try using a different ship.
